offerings.title: For Students
offerings.description: Let me personally guide you through your early career journey with focused 1-on-1 mentoring. I'll help you navigate the tech and product industry landscape, drawing from my own experience to give you practical insights.
benefits: Detailed review of your professional profiles

offerings.title: For Early Professionals
offerings.description: Work directly with me to accelerate your career growth in tech. I'll share battle-tested strategies from my experience to help you overcome challenges and create meaningful impact in your role.
benefits: Real solutions for your workplace challenges

offerings.title: For Early Founders
offerings.description: Let me help you transform your vision into reality. Drawing from my founder experience, I'll guide you through the crucial early stages of your startup journey with practical, actionable advice.
benefits: 3 intensive two-hour sessions with me within 30 days
1 hr strategy session to explore ongoing partnership

offerings.title: For Businesses
offerings.description: Partner with me to elevate your business through strategic tech implementation. I'll personally help you identify and leverage the right tools and processes to boost your team's efficiency.
benefits: 3 Hr hands-on AI training for your teams
1 hr strategy session to explore ongoing partnership
